trends: There have been no other sightings in Northfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details7\7\10 9:53 pm est. i was at small gathering of friends on top of a place we call boenhill, in northfield, vermont. we were sitting around a bon fire when someone noticed this object coming from south to north. i was in the treeline when it was first noticed and i ran out to the field near the bon fire to take a look. there was 9 of us there that night and we all saw this object. it flew from south to north and covered the entire skyline in 45 -60 seconds. the object did not make any sound. planes fly over bonehill all the time but we can hear them. this did not make a peep. the object was very bright and appeared fairly large in the sky. it was moving very fast and i have never seen anything move that fast. the object flew right over us but it was appeared to be very high in the sky. being at night i really have no clue how far up it was but it seemed very high as we could not hear anything. it was a incredibly clear night sky and all of the stars were visible. there were some shooting stars that night but this was no shooting star. because it was such a clear night we were able to see satellites in the sky. the object we saw was at least 1o times larger and brighter then any satellite i have ever seen. after it flew over us it continued north and we were watching its backside. it had blinking lights on it(i think 2 blinking lights). after it went out of sight i went back into the treeline where we were playing cards. about a minute later some of my friends saw it again and it was traveling from west to east. this time when i ran out i did not get to see it as it was over the hill already. but my friends claims it looked like what we had seen just earlier. i am not sure what it was to be honest. i know alot about ufo's and military aircraft. in my life i have never seen a ufo. every time i have looked up in the sky at some weird object i have been able to identify it. this was some sort of aircraft for sure but it was no commercial airliner or anything like that. i also work next to an air national guard base in burlington, vermont. i see military aircraft take off and land all of the time. this object appeared to fly much higher and made no sound. f-16s and f-15 make a ton of sound. imo this had to either be a new military spy plane or something even more bizarre. as it flew over head my friends scrambled for their cell phones to take photos and\or video. i have not seen any of this yet but i am hoping there is something captured.
Summary: Witnessed a bright, high flying object traveling at very fast speeds.
